title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.7.20 | 02-01-2022
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Om Agyanati Miran Dhasya Gyanan Janishalakaya Chaksharun Militam Yena Tasmai Shri Gurave Namaha
segments.summary: The lecture begins with traditional Vaishnava prayers and mantras, setting a spiritual tone.

segments.key_quote: It can destroy a whole universe that is the kind of power this Brahmastra has.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces the context of Srimad Bhagavatam 1.7.20, focusing on Ashwathama's use of the Brahmastra and its destructive power.

segments.key_quote: This science of utilizing a particular sound to generate a, an effect.
segments.summary: The lecture explains the science behind mantra weapons, emphasizing the importance of purification and proper technique.

segments.key_quote: Even if he let us say was trying to use it against arjuna he should have known how to release it the the the weapon the brahmastra strikes arjuna and comes back but he did not know how to withdraw
segments.summary: The speaker elaborates on Ashwathama's incomplete knowledge of the Brahmastra and the potential consequences of its improper use.

segments.key_quote: So he was because his life was in danger somehow save himself now and without even really being bothered about the destruction this can do
segments.summary: The lecture criticizes Ashwathama's unscrupulous behavior and contrasts modern gross methods of material manipulation with more subtle ancient techniques.

segments.key_quote: Just by chanting the mantra, mantra means the power of sound.
segments.summary: The speaker contrasts the subtle sound vibration of the Brahmastra with the spiritual sound vibration of the Hare Krishna mantra, emphasizing the importance of chanting purely and learning from an expert.

segments.key_quote: It can nullify millions of lifetimes of sinful reactions that a person might have committed
segments.summary: The lecture concludes by highlighting the immense spiritual benefits of chanting the Hare Krishna mantra purely, including the nullification of sinful reactions and the attainment of Krishna Prema.
